main_definition: To produce musical sounds by vocalizing melodies, often accompanied by rhythm.

meanings_and_examples.example: She loves to sing along with the radio while driving.
He sang his heart out at the karaoke bar, pouring all of his sadness into a ballad.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To produce sounds resembling those made by vocal music
meanings_and_examples.example: The choir began to sing in unison, their voices blending harmoniously together.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make a sound with the voice as if singing without any melody or rhythm
meanings_and_examples.example: He started to 'sing' random words out of frustration during his math class.
